contexts.context: "The common thief," said Lledos, <mark>pouring</mark> himself more greef, warming to his subject....
.... You learned well." Lledos said as he <mark>poured</mark> the gold pieces into the specially designed compartments in...
...is fully cooked and the Scuttle has melted, <mark>pour</mark> from the pan into the pie crust. Sprinkle...
